analysis.key_quote: Politicizing government workers was something that had to be fought a long time ago when creating the civil service itself long ago, and the reasons for having a non-political civil service remains the same.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of maintaining a non-political civil service and referencing historical struggles against politicization, which aligns with concerns about the integrity of the merit-based system.
